sqlMap.select:
SELECT tenant_id tenantId,name name,code code,logo logo,country country,province province, language language,zip_code zipCode,contract_num contractNum,currency currency,status status, time_zone timeZone,theme theme, date_format(create_dt,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') createDt, date_format(start_dt,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') startDt, date_format(end_dt,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') endDt FROM Tenant
TENANT_ID=#tenantId# CODE=#code# STATUS=#status#
